mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPOSIT_MESSAGE( MESSAGE_NUMBER, VERSION, LAUNCH_TIME, SENDER, RECEIVER, TYPE, BANK_CODE, ACCT_NUMBER, AMOUNT, DOC_NUMBER, TRANS_SN )VALUES( #{messageNumber}, #{version}, #{launchTime}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{type}, #{bankCode}, #{accountNumber}, #{amount}, #{docNumber}, #{transSN} )
